content: HUD-2 Universal plastic anchor Universal plastic anchor for light-duty fastening to hollow and solid base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile – you can use the same plastic anchor to fasten to a wide range of base materials: concrete, solid brick, hollow brick, gas (aerated) concrete, drywall Suitable for fastening through in-place parts Anti-twist design – redesigned fins help to prevent rotation during screwdriving, especially in hollow bricks and aerated concrete Easier to use – a wide collar prevents the anchor from slipping into the wall cavity, while precise screw guidance helps to prevent damage during screwdriving Applications Fastening electrical fixtures and cabling Fastening and interior finishing elements Please note: screws are sold separately, except where clearly listed in the package content (see technical data sheet for required screw size) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: N/A Approvals / Test reports: N/A Material, corrosion: Plastic Technical Data | Head configuration | N/A | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Plastic | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Outdoor ### ITEMS- 2287818 - Univ. anchor HUD-2 5x25 (500) - Package Size 500 pc Package Contents: - 1x HUD2 5x25 Anchor - 2287820 - Univ. anchor HUD-2 6x30 (500) - Package Size 500 pc Package Contents: - 1x HUD2 6x30 Anchor - 3753696 - HUD-2 1/4 X 1 3/16 W/SCREW (500) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 500x HUD2 6x30 Anchor - 500x 10X1 1/2 COMBO HEAD 500/BOX Screw - 2287816 - Univ. anchor HUD-2 8x40 (400) - Package Size 400 pc Package Contents: - 1x HUD2 8x40 Anchor
tag_description: Universal plastic anchor for light-duty fastening to hollow and solid base materials
